metadata.description: Run Nmap with selectable scan profiles

raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nmaprun>
<?xml-stylesheet href="file:///opt/homebrew/bin/../share/nmap/nmap.xsl" type="text/xsl"?>
<!-- Nmap 7.98 scan initiated Thu Nov 27 15:42:56 2025 as: nmap -T3 -Pn -sV -p80,443,22 -oX - 127.0.0.1 -->
<nmaprun scanner="nmap" args="nmap -T3 -Pn -sV -p80,443,22 -oX - 127.0.0.1" start="1764238376" startstr="Thu Nov 27 15:42:56 2025" version="7.98" xmloutputversion="1.05">
<scaninfo type="connect" protocol="tcp" numservices="3" services="22,80,443"/>
<verbose level="0"/>
<debugging level="0"/>
<host starttime="1764238376" endtime="1764238376"><status state="up" reason="user-set" reason_ttl="0"/>
<address addr="127.0.0.1" addrtype="ipv4"/>
<hostnames>
<hostname name="localhost" type="PTR"/>
</hostnames>
<ports><port protocol="tcp" portid="22"><state state="closed" reason="conn-refused" reason_ttl="0"/><service name="ssh" method="table" conf="3"/></port>

<port protocol="tcp" portid="443"><state state="closed" reason="conn-refused" reason_ttl="0"/><service name="https" method="table" conf="3"/></port>
</ports>
<times srtt="90" rttvar="2816" to="100000"/>

<runstats><finished time="1764238376" timestr="Thu Nov 27 15:42:56 2025" summary="Nmap done at Thu Nov 27 15:42:56 2025; 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 0.13 seconds" elapsed="0.13" exit="success"/><hosts up="1" down="0" total="1"/>
